2020-10-13-wolverhampton.name: wolverhampton
2020-10-13-wolverhampton.going:
GOING TAPETA: STANDARD (Mostly cloudy)
Stalls 7f - Outside; Remainder - Inside

races.name: Sky Sports Racing HD Virgin 535 Maiden Auction Stakes
races.verdict: This looks between promising sorts Castana Dia and FORBIDDEN SECRET with preference for the latter after his Redcar 2nd.

nags.name: Loyal Havana
nags.rp_comment: Other newcomers appeal more on paper so he faces no easy introduction

nags.name: Acquisitor
nags.rp_comment: Hung left when 5th of 14 in Bath novice latest; needs more if he's to open his account

nags.name: Bravado
nags.rp_comment: In excellent hands and is a much-respected newcomer

nags.name: Forbidden Secret
nags.rp_comment: Promising debut second in 6f Redcar novice, coming home well; holds leading claims

nags.name: Split Elevens
nags.rp_comment: Failed to build on good C&D 4th, looking hard ride here last time; others preferred

nags.name: Castana Dia
nags.rp_comment: Encouraging 3rd in 6f Yarmouth novice on debut; more to offer so sure to be in the mix

nags.name: Snap Out Of It
nags.rp_comment: Not without interest on paper but yard not noted for debut winners; market can guide

nags.name: Priscilla's Wish
nags.rp_comment: Green and never dangerous when debut 5th of 8 over C&D needs to step forward

races.name: Watch Free Race Replays On attheraces.com Nursery Handicap
races.verdict: Marginal preference is for PEERLESS who stepped up on his previous efforts when runner-up at Bath and still looks on a workable mark

nags.name: Peerless
nags.rp_comment: Best effort when 2nd in Bath nursery (5.7f) 15 days ago; up 4lb but still a big player

nags.name: Shawshank
nags.rp_comment: Shaped better than of late when 8th in C&D nursery on yard debut; more needed for 1st win

nags.name: Sociality
nags.rp_comment: Yet to make the frame in five runs but good 5th in C&D nursery latest; worth considering

nags.name: Chilli Leaves
nags.rp_comment: Not gone on since debut fourth in 7f Thirsk novice for Keith Dalgleish; hard to warm to

nags.name: Hotalena
nags.rp_comment: Forcing tactics overdone when 4th in 5.7f Bath nursery latest so must enter calculations

nags.name: Vivacious Boy
nags.rp_comment: Landed 5f Musselburgh nursery latest; up 5lb but open to more progress so firmly in frame

nags.name: Toplight
nags.rp_comment: Lit up in first-time blinkers in 6f nursery here latest but still needs to show more here

nags.name: Upside Down
nags.rp_comment: In good recent form without winning in nurseries, fourth over 6f here last time; claims

nags.name: Mid Day Rush
nags.rp_comment: Last in 6f nursery here and now with new handler after 53-day break; needs to bounce back

nags.name: Jazzy Socks
nags.rp_comment: Improved in visor when 5th in 6f Chelmsford nursery latest; respected off same mark

nags.name: Apache Mist
nags.rp_comment: Only 6th in 6f nursery here latest; not dismissed if able to shrug it off after a break

races.name: Download The At The Races App Handicap
races.verdict: It could pay to side with SEA OF SHADOWS, who showed improved form on her handicap debut and shaped as if this drop in trip could suit.

nags.name: Ros's Dream
nags.rp_comment: Will need to improve for this step up in trip to defy this mark on her handicap debut.

nags.name: Corofin
nags.rp_comment: Reasons to believe step up in trip and 3lb drop could see her get competitive this time.

nags.name: Al Jawhra
nags.rp_comment: Went very close (1m2f) latest; stamina to prove over this far; should be thereabouts.

nags.name: Roman's Empress
nags.rp_comment: 12.5f turf win last month, but blotted her copybook since; bit to prove.

nags.name: Flying Standard
nags.rp_comment: Improved form on last two starts; same mark as when third at Kempton; enters calculations.

nags.name: Murat Asset
nags.rp_comment: Stamina on dam's side of his pedigree and could do better now stepped up again in trip.

nags.name: Mazekine
nags.rp_comment: Triple-figure odds and hasn't beaten many opponents home in three starts; makes no appeal.

nags.name: Windrush Song
nags.rp_comment: Handicap debut over a more suitable trip and a more competitive effort would not surprise.

nags.name: Glencoe Boy
nags.rp_comment: Hasn't delivered on minor promise he showed in novice events last year; plenty to prove.

nags.name: Grimsthorpe Castle
nags.rp_comment: Claims if repeating either of his best RPRs from July, but has a fair bit to prove.

nags.name: Sea Of Shadows
nags.rp_comment: Showed ability for the first time on her handicap debut; drop in trip fine; could go well.

nags.name: Dame Denali
nags.rp_comment: Has come close to winning just once, at Lingfield in March; not easy to recommend her.

races.name: Follow At The Races On Twitter Handicap (Div I)
races.verdict: Market confidence was justified when ROCKET DANCER won at Newcastle and he is taken to follow up off just 4lb higher

nags.name: Kenstone
nags.rp_comment: Losing run goes back 2 years but running well at 1m2f of late on AW/turf; thereabouts

nags.name: Kendergarten Kop
nags.rp_comment: Won 2 on Polytrack; handles Tapeta; ready Bath winner latest; up 7lb; still on good mark

nags.name: Beatbybeatbybeat
nags.rp_comment: Some lesser runs since winning off this mark here in Feb; back to form over C&D latest

nags.name: Rocket Dancer
nags.rp_comment: Landed a touch when winning on Tapeta debut at Newcastle; up 4lb; should have more to come

nags.name: Bay Of Naples
nags.rp_comment: Mixed these days but encouraging 2nd over C&D latest; on the premises again

nags.name: Itwouldberudenotto
nags.rp_comment: Out of sorts on turf but AW mark left more or less unchanged, 3lb lower than Jan defeat

nags.name: General Joe
nags.rp_comment: Promise over 7f on turf at 2 but yet to repeat it; lots to prove on Tapeta debut

nags.name: Mama Africa
nags.rp_comment: Triple Fibresand winner but just low-level form these days, including at Southwell

nags.name: Air Of York
nags.rp_comment: Triple course winner who won on turf in July; didn't get the best of runs here last month

races.name: Follow At The Races On Twitter Handicap (Div II)
races.verdict: First-time blinkers appeared to sharpen up HECTOR'S HERE over 1m2f at Newcastle last time and a drop in trip might work the oracle.

nags.name: The Stalking Moon
nags.rp_comment: Best result on AW when fourth at Lingfield (1m) last week but still has bit to prove.

nags.name: Beau Geste
nags.rp_comment: Fourth of nine on turf at Goodwood last time off this mark; return to Tapeta a plus.

nags.name: Traveller
nags.rp_comment: Won 13-runner handicap at Newcastle (1m, Tapeta) last time; up 5lb but likely to go well.

nags.name: Hector's Here
nags.rp_comment: Blinkered when fourth of 11 at Newcastle (1m2f, Tapeta) 15 days ago; has to build on that.

nags.name: Billy Roberts
nags.rp_comment: 0-8 on AW and opposable with headgear removed and tongue-strap added.

nags.name: Good Time Charlie
nags.rp_comment: Tailed off at Windsor (1m2f, soft) last time when unsuited by going; could bounce back.

nags.name: Berkshire Philly
nags.rp_comment: Beaten a neck over C&D last month; raised 2lb for that but still not fully exposed.

nags.name: G For Gabrial
nags.rp_comment: Second of 12 in handicap at Newcastle (1m) on AW debut 11 days ago; up 1lb.

nags.name: Khazaf
nags.rp_comment: Better form when eighth of 12 over C&D eight days ago; visored first time.

races.name: Free Daily Tips On attheraces.com Handicap (Div I)
races.verdict: Ivan Furtado's course winner NOBLE DAWN can race off the same mark as when an excellent clear second at Pontefract so she gets the vote

nags.name: Light Up Our Stars
nags.rp_comment: Has failed to beat a rival in three runs for current yard this season; easily opposed

nags.name: Albadr
nags.rp_comment: Little to show for current yard, beating only one in Chelmsford h'cap latest

nags.name: Daafr
nags.rp_comment: C&D winner and good 4th at Chelmsford latest; off 2lb lower here so firmly in the mix

nags.name: Zafaranah
nags.rp_comment: C&D winner; took step back in right direction when 6th at Chelmsford latest; respected

nags.name: London
nags.rp_comment: Fair 7f/1m AW winner but off 22 months; very hard to warm to after his long absence

nags.name: Sir Hamilton
nags.rp_comment: Showed his turn is near when excellent C&D 2nd latest; up 1lb but good claims

nags.name: Daniel Deronda
nags.rp_comment: Failed to make the frame in four runs for Karl Burke; big step forward needed for new yard

nags.name: Noble Dawn
nags.rp_comment: Fine 2nd in 1m Pontefract h'cap latest; winner on Tapeta so a bold showing on cards here

nags.name: Kuwait Shield
nags.rp_comment: Arrives in just fair form, sixth in 1m Ayr h'cap latest; bit more is needed on Tapeta bow

nags.name: Jeddeyd
nags.rp_comment: Failed to build on debut 4th here in 1m Chester novice; more to do on his h'cap bow

nags.name: Minori
nags.rp_comment: Has offered little in 4 outings; tongue tied for her Tapeta debut now with lots to find

races.name: Free Daily Tips On attheraces.com Handicap (Div II)
races.verdict: Antico Lady is greatly respected but it might be worth giving another chance to PRIZE FIGHTING.

nags.name: Antico Lady
nags.rp_comment: C&D winner; feasibly treated and should give a good account eased in grade

nags.name: Jack D'Or
nags.rp_comment: Poor strike-rate but he's down in the weights and shorter trip no problem; respected

nags.name: Flying Dragon
nags.rp_comment: Often placed but hard to win with and well held the last twice; capable but risky

nags.name: Wind In My Sails
nags.rp_comment: 0-10 on AW; struggling this year but handicapper relenting and Hollie Doyle booked

nags.name: More Than A Prince
nags.rp_comment: On winning mark but struggling this year and needs the new headgear to revive his fortunes

nags.name: Hot Team
nags.rp_comment: On losing run and recent efforts haven't suggested he was primed to strike

nags.name: Prize Fighting
nags.rp_comment: Too bad to be true on h'cap debut and this unexposed 3yo needs consideration

nags.name: Nibras Wish
nags.rp_comment: Improved for blinkers, winning over 1m4f here ten days ago; drop in trip not sure to suit

nags.name: Harvest Day
nags.rp_comment: Five-time winner and on good mark; needs to step up on recent efforts though

nags.name: Star Of Wells
nags.rp_comment: No show in h'caps for Tom Ward this summer; sold 7,500gns since latest; needs market check

races.name: Sky Sports Racing On Sky 415 Handicap
races.verdict: Ivadream and Aramis Grey have claims but FREEDOM AND WHEAT (nap) is preferred as he bids for a C&D hat-trick.

nags.name: Inaam
nags.rp_comment: Easy C&D win in November came off just 1lb lower; market likely to predict a revival

nags.name: Hammer Gun
nags.rp_comment: Struggling this year, including at his beloved Southwell last week

nags.name: Street Poet
nags.rp_comment: Loves it around here and mark not excessive; did underperform last time though

nags.name: Al Aresh
nags.rp_comment: Ex-French 4yo who hasn't hit top gear for new yard; won the 7.00 here last night.

nags.name: Freedom And Wheat
nags.rp_comment: Won his last two, both over C&D and in good style; leading contender again

nags.name: Aramis Grey
nags.rp_comment: Improving all the time and latest C&D 2nd a good effort; still not fully exposed

nags.name: Incognito
nags.rp_comment: 12-race maiden; interesting on this season's best but needs to leave two quiet runs behind

nags.name: Sirius Slew
nags.rp_comment: On handy mark but he'll need a season's best to defy the widest stall here

nags.name: Willing To Please
nags.rp_comment: Not at best last time but had shown promise previously; hood now added

nags.name: Ivadream
nags.rp_comment: Beat Aramis Grey over C&D latest; not sure to confirm placings but in the mix once more

nags.name: Winklemann
nags.rp_comment: Not fired so far this year and others have more pressing claims

nags.name: Sweet Joanna
nags.rp_comment: Not improved on sole 2yo run so far this year; may do now handicapping

races.name: attheraces.com Handicap
races.verdict: A competitive race but RIGHT ACTION has been running well this season and boasts a fine record at this track.

nags.name: Flavius Titus
nags.rp_comment: More promise at Newmarket latest; well drawn and on good mark; new headgear; considered

nags.name: Right Action
nags.rp_comment: Running creditably this year and course record reads -112; big run on the cards

nags.name: Medieval
nags.rp_comment: On losing run but he's been knocking at the door of late; engaged 8.00 Wolverhampton Mon

nags.name: Fancy Footings
nags.rp_comment: Conditions fine and not impossibly treated; new yard also runs Right Action

nags.name: Harry Love
nags.rp_comment: Not built on Beverley win in August; risks attached on AW debut

nags.name: Inhalation
nags.rp_comment: Headgear could spark him back to his best but widest draw isn't ideal

nags.name: Siglo Six
nags.rp_comment: Dangerous mark now and could go well at a price

nags.name: Sermon
nags.rp_comment: Running well in handicaps but needs more to come out on top in this field

nags.name: Stringybark Creek
nags.rp_comment: 11 wins to his name but ran poorly latest and needs to get right back to his best

nags.name: One Hart
nags.rp_comment: C&D winner in August but not beaten a rival in either start since

nags.name: Lucky Lodge
nags.rp_comment: Evergreen veteran but beaten in a lesser race here ten days ago

nags.name: Maysong
nags.rp_comment: Shaped as though this mark was fair on latest and needs consideration
